Title: Bigil
Writer: Atlee Kumar (Dialogue), Atlee Kumar (Story), Atlee Kumar (screenplay), Ramanagirivasan (Dialogue)
Actors: Nayanthara, Joseph Vijay, Jackie Shroff, Yogi Babu
Plot: Story revolves around a football coach; who struggles to fulfill the dream of his late friend and seeks out revenge on the death of his best friend.
